notes: USA-based supplier of Neossance™ Squalane (plant-sugar derived, non-comedogenic) as reliable olive squalane substitute. Serves clean beauty, sustainable skincare, and DIY formulation. Applications: Prevents water loss (10-30%), restores suppleness, non-comedogenic. Made from plant-sugars as reliable olive squalane substitute. Mid-range pricing ($55-85/kg) with small to medium quantities (50g-5kg) and multiple sizes available. Cosmetic grade and non-comedogenic tested. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Product information and formulation tips available. Ideal for sustainable formulations and small-scale production.
